name: th3l4b
tagline: Get common functionality implemented as simple as a taking the decision
body:
Get common functionality for your project simply easily.

By simply defining your data model you can get these capabilities (and counting):

* Your model Java classes generated for you
* In memory storage
* JDBC storage
* Android SQLite storage
* MongoDB storage
* A RESTful inteface
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
